entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a character who has a wand and is interacting with Mrs. Cole.

entities.name: cole
entities.description: Mrs. Cole is introduced as an inconveniently sharp woman who interacts with Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who saw Dumbledore slip his wand out of his pocket, but he does not interact directly with Mrs. Cole or Dumbledore in this passage.

relationships.description: Dumbledore interacts with Mrs. Cole by passing her a piece of blank paper and waving his wand over it.
Mrs. Cole interacts with Dumbledore by receiving the piece of blank paper from him and handing it back.
